newsitem.title: USA: Micrografx names auditor after Andersen resigns.
newsitem.headline: Micrografx names auditor after Andersen resigns.

text.p: Micrografx Inc said it has named Ernst & Young as its new auditor of record, and that Arthur Andersen has resigned as its audit firm, effective immediately.
The company said Ernst & Young has served as tax advisor to Micrografx since the spring of 1996 and the firm's audit due diligence and transition work are already underway.

"Arthur Andersen has assured the Micrografx board that the decision to resign as auditors is not related to any disagreements concerning accounting policy or practice," said Doug Richard, president of Micrografx.
Micrografx intends to release its quarterly earnings on January 27, at the close of the market.
